revised_title: Resonance in Crystal Beams of Sodium-Ammonium Seignette Salt: Experimental Results and Piezo-Electric Properties
tldr: This article explores the resonance phenomenon in crystal beams of sodium-ammonium seignette salt, focusing on their unique elastic and piezo-electric properties. The author describes the experimental setup and results, demonstrating that the beams are ideal for studying resonance effects due to their identical elastic properties along the length and breadth. The findings contribute to a better understanding of piezo-electricity and resonance in crystal beams.
